tools.name: get_group_games
tools.description: Get poker games for a group. Can filter by status (active/closed). Use this when a user asks about games in a poker group.

group_name.description: The name of the poker group (e.g. 'smartjones')

status.description: Filter by game status. Omit for all games.

tools.name: get_player_buyins
tools.description: Get buy-in information for a specific player. Shows current game buy-ins and all-time stats. Use when a user asks about a player's buy-ins or spending.

group_name.description: Optional: poker group name to search within

tools.name: get_game_players
tools.description: Get all players and their stats for a specific game by game ID. Shows buy-ins, chip counts, and net results.

tools.name: get_group_summary
tools.description: Get a quick overview of a poker group: total players, games, and current active game details.

group_name.description: The name of the poker group

tools.name: list_groups
tools.description: List all available poker groups. Use when the user asks what groups exist.
